text.section:
For the construction, maintenance, or operation of any part of a project, the district may acquire any interest in real property by:
Purchase; or
Exercise of the power of eminent domain as provided in Title 12 of the Real Property Article.

section.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subsection, the district may condemn a property right in a cemetery only to install a sewer line or a water line.

text.section:
Before the district condemns a property right in a cemetery, the sanitary commission shall adopt a resolution that:
Is approved by a majority of the sanitary commissioners appointed from the member county in which the cemetery is located;
Includes a declaration that the condemnation is necessary for the public health and safety; and
Includes a declaration that immediate acquisition of the property right in the cemetery is necessary.
The sanitary commission shall bury every water line and sewer line that it builds in cemetery land.
